Research & Innovation.question: Are there any ongoing or upcoming research projects or innovation initiatives? If yes then list them
Research & Innovation.result:
As a language model AI, I am unable to access real-time data or browse the internet for updates on specific research projects or innovation initiatives. However, based on my knowledge cutoff date in September 2021, here are some notable ongoing or upcoming projects related to climate change mitigation and adaptation:

1. The Solidarity & Just Energy Transition (JET) Fund: This is an international initiative launched by the German government to support developing countries in their transition towards renewable energy sources and climate-resilient development.
2. Mission Innovation: This global initiative brings together governments and private sector entities to accelerate clean energy innovation and commercialization.
3. The Global Commission on Adaptation: Established in 209, this commission comprises leaders from various sectors who work together to promote and support adaptation efforts around the world.
4. Project Drawdown: This ongoing initiative, led by environmentalist Paul Hawken, seeks to identify, measure, and describe the most effective solutions for reducing greenhouse gas emissions and addressing climate change.
5. The European Green Deal: Announced by the European Commission in December 2021, this policy framework aims to make Europe climate-neutral by 2030, while creating new jobs and ensuring social fairness.
6. The United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change (UNFCCC): Ongoing negotiations and processes under the UNFCCC aim to facilitate international cooperation in addressing climate change.

Please note that these examples represent only a small fraction of the numerous research projects, innovation initiatives, and policies being developed globally to tackle climate change.
